text: is a Japanese politician who has been the Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry since 2024. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP). He has been a member of the House of Representatives since 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:People from Gifu Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of economy, trade and industry of Japan
title: Yoji Muto
